EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for attending our B&GA Asia-Pacific Operators Conference. Hello {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
Thank you for attending our Virtual Operator Conference!
This webcast is now on-demand <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/pNZK4nYjHftiaQDHoYRkLa?]]>, should you like to view it again. Please use code 444123.
Stay in the loop with us and youâ€™ll be among the first to learn about upcoming webinars, events, product launches and more! Sign up here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]>.
We look forward to seeing you again!
Thank you, Honeywell Aerospace WATCH NOW <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/pNZK4nYjHftiaQDHoYRkLa?]]>
